questions: Q. 1. What is meant by ‘political party’?
answers: Ans. A political party is a group of people come together to contest elections to hold power in the government.

questions: Q. 2. What is an important function of a Political Party in India ?
Q. 3. Who take direct part in the elections ?
Q. 4. Which is not a component of a political party ?
Q. 5. What is a ruling party ?
answers: Ans. Political party that runs the government.

questions: Q. 6. Write down any one characteristic of political parties in India.
answers: Ans. Parties play a decisive role in making laws for a country.

questions: Q. 7. What do you understand by recognised political party ?
answers: Ans. The parties which have been recognised by the Election Commission are known as recognised political parties.

questions: Q. 8. Write any one character of recognized political party.
answers: Ans. They must win at least two seats in the assembly election.
